rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with foyer and storage space for coats and shoes.
Open-plan living room with access to a semi-outdoor terrace. Integrates Vastu elements with eastward positioning for positive energy flow.
Modern open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area, optimized for ergonomics and workflow. Features north-east alignment to invite prosperity and culinary success according to Vastu.
Adjacent to the living area and kitchen, providing a comfortable dining space for family gatherings.
Spacious two-car garage located at the rear of the plot for easy access to the house. Design includes additional storage options.
Functional ground floor bathroom with necessary amenities and proper ventilation.

openings.description: Main entry door ensuring ease of access while aligning with Vastu principles by facing north.
East-facing windows to allow morning light and positive energy flow.
Access door to the semi-outdoor terrace that serves as an extension of the living area.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with attached en-suite bathroom. Designed with east-facing windows for early morning sunlight in line with Vastu.
Additional bedroom located towards the north-west to maintain privacy and balance energy flow.
Another bedroom integrated on this level to complete a total of three bedrooms above ground.
Common bathroom shared by the two additional bedrooms for convenience.

openings.description: East-facing windows to ensure optimum sunlight and air circulation in the bedrooms.
Balcony providing a private outdoor space for relaxation and fresh air.

rooms.description: A modern bedroom designed with ample natural light and a private balcony.
Second bedroom on the upper level to balance the design while maintaining privacy.
A multi-functional space serving as a study or home office with a north-west orientation for clarity and concentration.
Dedicated private gym area integrated on the second floor. Features state-of-the-art equipment and ample storage while ensuring privacy.

openings.description: East-facing windows to allow for optimal light and air circulation in the bedroom and gym area.
